sentences.sContent: Suicide bombings ensuing due to revenge are prevalent in certain regions where sanguinary conflicts among various ethnic, religious and interest groups are ubiquitous.
sentences.sContent_eng: Suicide bombings ensuing due to revenge are prevalent in certain regions where sanguinary conflicts among various ethnic, religious and interest groups are ubiquitous.
sentences.sCn: 自杀性爆炸事件的接连发生是因为到处存在那些被各种伦理性，宗教性及兴趣的团体在一些发生流血冲突的地区作恶。

sentences.sContent: He is alike to datura, the dependence blood is a nutrient, has deadly perilous, cruel sanguinary, so, he is too standing single.
sentences.sContent_eng: He is alike to datura, the dependence blood is a nutrient, has deadly perilous, cruel sanguinary, so, he is too standing single.
sentences.sCn: 他与曼陀罗一样，依赖鲜血为养份，有着致命的危险，残忍血腥，所以，他也是孤独的。
